page.title: 14ROADSIDE RESTAURANT
page.content: The Happy Eater Restaurant: sample menu Starter: Tomato soup with a dash of cream 45p. Short order: Banger brunch-3 sausages fried egg and chips 175p. Real American Hamburgers-pure ground beef, griddled to order, in a sesame seed bun with chips 275p. Crispy fillet of cod-deep fried in batter with peas and lemon wedge 255p Prawn salad 375p. Hot pancakes with choice of lemon, jam or maple syrup 75p. Coffee with cream 38p. Quarter litre of wine 135p. V.A.T. 15% Service not included. Children's menu: Dougal's delight- Sausage, baked beans, chips and tomato sauce 100p.
